abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; Christie’s Outsider and Vernacular Art sale will auction William Edmondson limestone sculpture titled Boxer, which is expected to go for $150,000 to $250,000; Outsider Art Fair will feature booth commemorating recently deceased artist Ionel Talpazan; Alexander and Bonin Gallery relocates from Chelsea neighborhood to TriBeCa.
lead_paragraph: This limestone sculpture, believed to be modeled after Joe Louis, will be sold at Christie’s Outsider and Vernacular Art sale.

headline.main: William Edmondson’s ‘Boxer,’ Presumed Lost, Goes to Auction
headline.print_headline: ‘Boxer,’ Presumed Lost, Is Back in the Ring

snippet: This limestone sculpture, believed to be modeled after Joe Louis, will be sold at Christie’s Outsider and Vernacular Art sale.
